Wisdom: احْذَرْ مُجَالَسَةَ قَرِينِ السَّوْءِ فَإِنَّهُ يَهْلِكُ مُقَارِنَهُ [قَرِينَهُ‏] وَيُرْدِي مُصَاحِبَهُ [صَاحِبَهُ‏]
enWisdom: Be careful not to associate with an evil colleague, for his association will destroy you and his companionship will ruin you
The bane of goodness is an evil companion

Wisdom: جِمَاعُ الشَّرِّ فِي مُقَارَنَةِ قَرِينِ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: The consolidation of evil is in association with a wicked companion
A bad companion is [like] a splinter of hellfire

Wisdom: قَرِينُ السَّوْءِ شَرُّ قَرِينٍ وَدَاءُ اللُّؤْمِ دَاءٌ دَفِينٌ
enWisdom: It is only a few of the brothers who are fair
